Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Log A and Log B contain similar events with slight timestamp variations and naming differences. Matching events is possible using order_id, timestamps, and event type similarity.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
